ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: 1. Life is extremely valuable to me.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 2. Sometimes my life feels so hard that I just want to escape.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 3. I welcome the thought of drifting off to sleep and never waking up.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 4. I want to end my life.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 5. I feel that I am needed in this world.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 6. I feel like I am a constant burden to my family.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 7. I often wish that I would pass away in my sleep.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 8. I can see no sense in carrying on with this empty existence.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 9. I feel that my life is meaningful.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 10. I never thought my life would turn out this poorly.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 11. At times I think that if things get much worse for me, I will end my life.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 12. I have recently been thinking a great deal about specific ways of killing myself.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 13. I have come to accept my life with all of its ups and downs.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 14. I frequently feel useless.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 15. I am looking forward to my eternal rest.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 16. There are times when I feel like I am wasting away.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 17. I have seriously considered suicide more than once earlier in my life.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 18. I find joy and beauty in life.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 19. I generally feel pretty worthless.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 20. I am preoccupied with wishing that my life were over soon.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 21. I frequently think that my family will be better off when I am dead.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 22. I am certain that I have something to live for.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 23. There is nothing further that I can do to help myself or anyone else.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 24. I often wish that someone could give me a pill to make me go to sleep and never wake up.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 25. I might do something to end it all if I could only muster the energy to do so.

ElementDescription: 26. I have tried ending my life in the past.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 27. I feel that my life still has dignity.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 28. Lately it seems that my health is really going downhill.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 29. I feel that there is nothing left for me in this world.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 30. I long for the peaceful slumber of death.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know

ElementDescription: 31. I believe that others need me.
Notes: 1= Strongly Disagree; 2= Disagree; 3= Neither Agree nor Disagree; 4= Agree; 5= Strongly Agree; 7= Refused; 8= Don't Know
